html:
7.30.24  2:11 am   How do you think up such complex chord progressions and stuff

      it's the same as thinking up complex words, but you don't think about thinking of the words (or chords) and the point is also not that they are complicated. the point is just that the whole thing goes nice. so how do you make things go nice? deep down you have to have a reason why you want so badly for it to go so nice. that's all it takes

7.30.24  1:29 am   why is recording vocals so damn hard? i think i sing really well when i'm just singing and playing a song on my keyboard in my room, but the second i start recording lines for a song they're always just subtly out of tune, or a little to loud or soft in places, or just kinda flat. any advice? thanks

      maybe you could quit your job and then get a gig touring with a 3 piece band in 1923

7.30.24  12:25 am   how do i get away with hoaxes?

      maybe stick to the true hoaxes

7.30.24  12:13 am   what's your favorite idea?

      having another idea

7.29.24  8:28 pm   which type of news do you turn on, and which type of news do you get turned on by? why does this news get more views

      the news tends to find the flames. a lot of people tend to be turned on by the flames, and thus click on the news when they see flames. the news thus has professional flame finders who find the genuine flames because it is still as of yet frowned upon for them to make up their own flames

7.29.24  8:27 pm   will you ever do a tutorial in how to have the most brainless thoughts? I've always wanted to do that.

      i don't really know what that is

7.29.24  8:13 pm   don't you love it when something makes you look at something else in a new light?

      sure, that sounds nice

7.29.24  7:41 pm   who can make a lot of products real fast

      honestly i'm sure you could do it

7.29.24  7:39 pm   green grass grows, what does snow do?

      well, one of the things it does is it falls from the sky

7.29.24  7:25 pm   How do I practice to get better? I feel like all I do is play around when I try to "practice".

      just start going around telling people you are already better at what you want to be better at. then you won't have time to play, you will quickly have to prove you're as good as you promised

7.29.24  5:13 pm   what's a good title for a cheesy sci-fi B-movie?

      star wars

7.29.24  11:17 am   do you like to watch and listen to your own music videos after you make them?

      very occasionally

7.29.24  9:29 am   thoughts on differential equations?

      dank

7.29.24  8:46 am   Is it ethical to assign morality to woodpeckers?

      sure

7.29.24  8:34 am   do you believe free will is a thing?

     yes

     if so, does anyone ever do anything "unintentionally"?

      sure

7.29.24  8:33 am   How is Pablao Rectangles (from What is Love?) a hearty breakfast?

      might not necessarily be. that is for illustration purposes only

7.29.24  1:25 am   can you finally taste the cheese on the moon

      i still haven't been to the moon

7.29.24  1:24 am   what's you go to drink when they ask "can I get any drinks started for ya?"

      i don't go to a drink, i go to some internal confusion as to why they didn't offer to also finish making the drink, and then further contemplating that it actually takes more words to offer to do less, and so on from there

7.29.24  1:12 am   what keyboard key is your right index finger hovering over at the moment, if any

      the next question key

7.29.24  12:29 am   what happens if you give a mouse a cookie?

      the mouse will accept the cookie without making any additional requests

7.29.24  12:16 am   Is it normal to feel like the i ching told me what i knew i needed to do all along for me to really consider actually starting to do it?

      it's also possible that you simply told the i ching what you wanted to do, and the i ching nodded along understandingly like a trusted friend

7.28.24  9:42 pm   Are things good, bad, both, neither, or some combination that cannot be comprehended?

      it is a combination of being a combination and not being a combination

7.28.24  8:21 pm   how do you cope with rage

      how about synchronized swimming

7.28.24  7:29 pm   who would you want to interview if given the opportunity?

      you

7.28.24  4:51 pm   What 2 + 2?

      22

7.28.24  4:40 pm   advice on how to make music that sounds like an idea?

      the music really wants to sound like what you really believe in. so all that really matters is that you believe in the idea. the music doesn't even want to be told what to do, it just wants you to believe in the idea, and as soon as you do then the music will be right there

7.28.24  4:39 pm   i want to do it all by myself. how important is it to have help from others? you seem like youve been able to be great at doing it all yourself with the things you make, but maybe im missing something

      the only thing you are missing perhaps is the true belief that some people are at their strongest when working alone. maybe you're just waiting for one of those people to openly admit it

7.28.24  2:17 pm   if you were in the possession of a magical potato that doubled every day, how would you deal with it so that it doesn't cause the planet to be potato-ized?

      i'd use magic of course. normally i wouldn't consider that a viable solution, but in this case it was apparently a viable part of the problem, so

7.28.24  11:46 am   can you give us a chord from one of the things you've been working on

      sure, A

7.28.24  9:57 am   where would you go if you went on tour?

      antarctica, first and foremost

7.28.24  8:08 am   tips for survival on the moon

      find the sun

7.28.24  7:06 am   how do i cheat the system when no one plays by the rules

      find the rules that people actually do play by, then figure out what system that belongs too, and then of course disobey the rules of that system, which no one else will have done theretofore

7.28.24  6:55 am   what is your favorite jazz chord (if you have one)?

      the whole reason chords were invented is so you could like it different at each moment

7.28.24  4:47 am   Hummingbirds, yes or no?

      humming birds are open response

7.28.24  3:29 am   Has Mount St. Helens blown up yet?

      not fully since 1980

7.28.24  1:25 am   What is the least likely answer to this question

      anything other than this

7.27.24  8:59 pm   i have a chord progression: B E G Eb (Eb is occasionally swapped for Asus4). It sounds mostly fine, but i feel like the Eb is too harsh sounding. Any ideas?

      in this case just change every chord to C

7.27.24  8:50 pm   what would you erase from this world?

      plastic after it's used

7.27.24  8:43 pm   Picture of the best thing?

      sometimes when you take a picture of the best thing, it's not even the best thing in the picture

7.27.24  8:12 pm   how do I rule the world? 

      first figure out how to rule yourself

7.27.24  4:37 pm   Do all facts begin life as a conspiracy theory?

      no

7.27.24  4:02 pm   thoughts on eggplants?

      i'll believe it when is see it

7.27.24  3:28 pm   have you ever written a haiku? (bonus points if you answer in a haiku)

      you may have misunderstood the rules of this website. on this site you actually get bonus points for not doing a haiku

7.27.24  1:39 pm   what kind of piano keyboard do you favor

      for me i like non-weighted keys, with dynamic sensitivity of course

7.27.24  12:57 pm   will you ever make your favorite video?

      i'll try every time

7.27.24  10:52 am   Will you continue to do more interviews? You're getting good at it

      maybe i'll just be the host instead

7.27.24  10:50 am   where do babies come from?

      other babies

7.27.24  8:38 am   What is the biggest thing in the world?

      the world

7.27.24  8:13 am   How do I eat Music?  

      you can only drink music

7.27.24  7:51 am   how to go to the moon

      you could walk maybe
